attributes.action: rule that shops should have the lights turned off when closed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it makes me angry to go past at least 10 major shops at even 3am and they still have a lot of lights on and even tv's. when we all do so  much to stop global warming shouldnt these big chains do it?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
